metadata.title: CVE-2024-39485 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: v4l: async: Properly re-initialise notifier entry in unregisterThe notifier_entry of a notifier is not re-initialised after unregisteringthe notifier. This leads to dangling pointers being left there so uselist_del_init() to return the notifier_entry an empty list.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
